column4: Anyone know about any issues with Ubuntu & Serpentine, specifically writing audio discs and recieving a "Success" dialog, but not actually writing to the CD?  I.E., putting the newly burned disc back in the player and seeing it read as a "Blank Disc"......... Just wondering.....
I need to upgrade to Edgy Eft, but I'm afraid of losing stuff on my hard disk...
back up your hard disk then.
